text: aur (yaad rakho) tumhaare maal aur tumhaaree aulaad kee ye hastee nahin ki tum ko hamaaree baaragaah mein muqarrib bana den magar (haan) jisane eemaan kubool kiya aur achchhe (achchhe) kaam kie un logon ke lie to unakee kaaraguzaariyon kee doharee jaza hai aur vah log (behasht ke) jharokhon mein itmenaan se rahenge
